revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = Strife weapon | class = StrifeWeapon | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Weapon|Weapon]]→StrifeWeapon
 →[[Classes:AssaultGun|AssaultGun]]
 →[[Classes:FlameThrower|FlameThrower]]
 →[[Classes:Mauler|Mauler]]
  →[[Classes:Mauler2|Mauler2]]
 →[[Classes:MiniMissileLauncher|MiniMissileLauncher]]
 →[[Classes:PunchDagger|PunchDagger]]
 →[[Classes:StrifeCrossbow|StrifeCrossbow]]
  →[[Classes:StrifeCrossbow2|StrifeCrossbow2]]
 →[[Classes:StrifeGrenadeLauncher|StrifeGrenadeLauncher]]
  →[[Classes:StrifeGrenadeLauncher2|StrifeGrenadeLauncher2]]
The base class for all [[Strife]] weapons, except the [[Classes:Sigil|Sigil]]. [[Classes:AssaultGunStanding|AssaultGunStanding]] is derived from [[Classes:WeaponGiver|WeaponGiver]] because it is merely an alternate pickup graphic for the [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]], not a different weapon. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR StrifeWeapon : {{Class|Weapon}} { {{property|Weapon.Kickback}} 100 }
